CustomField.description: Calculates the account segment based on CVR Employees and Company Type. Do NOT use for reporting! This is a tech field.
CustomField.formula: IF (ISPICKVAL(Segment__c , 'Internal Account') , "Internal Account", IF (ISPICKVAL(Segment__c , 'Public Account') , "Public Account", IF (ISNULL(NumberOfEmployees), IF( CVR_Short_Description__c = "ENK" || CVR_Short_Description__c = "PMV", "SoHo Account", "No Segment"), IF (NumberOfEmployees >= 0 && NumberOfEmployees <= 19, "SoHo Account", IF (NumberOfEmployees >= 20 && NumberOfEmployees <= 49, "Business Account", IF (NumberOfEmployees >= 50 && NumberOfEmployees <= 199, "Managed Account", IF (NumberOfEmployees >= 200 && NumberOfEmployees <= 999, "Large Account", IF (NumberOfEmployees >= 1000, "Key Account", "No Segment") )))))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Calculates the account segment based on CVR Employees and Company Type. Do NOT use for reporting! This is a tech field.
CustomField.label: Segment calculated
